configuration:
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce_shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname %%YARN_RESOURCEMANAGER_HOST%%
yarn.nodemanager.env-whitelist JAVA_HOME,HADOOP_COMMON_HOME,HADOOP_HDFS_HOME,HADOOP_CONF_DIR,CLASSPATH_PREPEND_DISTCACHE,HADOOP_YARN_HOME,HADOOP_MAPRED_HOME
@#HA_CONF_START#@
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.enabled true RM高可用，启动！
yarn.resourcemanager.cluster-id %%YARN_CLUSTER_ID%% Yarn集群ID
yarn.resourcemanager.ha.rm-ids %%YARN_RESOURCEMANAGER_NAMES%% ResourceManager逻辑名，逗号分隔多个
@#HA_REPEAT_RESOURCEMANAGER_START#@
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname.%%RESOURCEMANAGER_NAME%% %%RESOURCEMANAGER_HOST%% 设置RM逻辑名对应的主机名
yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address.%%RESOURCEMANAGER_NAME%% %%RESOURCEMANAGER_HOST%%:8088 设置RM逻辑名绑定的Web UI地址
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address.%%RESOURCEMANAGER_NAME%% %%RESOURCEMANAGER_HOST%%:8030
yarn.resourcemanager.address.%%RESOURCEMANAGER_NAME%% %%RESOURCEMANAGER_HOST%%:8032
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address.%%RESOURCEMANAGER_NAME%% %%RESOURCEMANAGER_HOST%%:8031
@#HA_REPEAT_RESOURCEMANAGER_END#@
yarn.resourcemanager.zk-address %%ZK_ADDRS%% 指定Zookeeper集群各节点地址
yarn.resourcemanager.recovery.enabled true 启动自动恢复状态
yarn.resourcemanager.store.class org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.recovery.ZKRMStateStore RM状态存储在Zookeeper中
@#HA_CONF_END#@
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb 256
